name: Graphacss
body:
### Welcome to Graphacss.
Graphacss is a graphic generator made with SASS and with the goal to create lightweight animated graphics using only HTML and CSS.

### Authors and Contributors
My name is [Régis Lutter](http://zetura.fr), I'm a French web developer leaving in Québec, Canada.
You can follow me on Twitter: [@regislutter](https://twitter.com/regislutter).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
